title: Update motto on homepage founder section to 'मानव सेवा परमो धर्मः'

requirements.text: Update the motto text displayed in the founder section on the Home page (frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx) from 'सेवा परमो धर्मः' to 'मानव सेवा परमो धर्मः'.

quotes: ISE MAIN PAGE PE ISKI JAGAH - सेवा परमो धर्मः YE "मानव सेवा परमो धर्मः" YE DALE

acceptanceCriteria: The founder section on the Home page displays the motto 'मानव सेवा परमो धर्मः' prominently.
The old motto text 'सेवा परमो धर्मः' no longer appears anywhere on the Home page.
The visual styling and layout of the founder section remains unchanged.

constraints: Only change the motto text string in Home.tsx; do not alter any other content or layout on the page.
nonGoals: Changing the motto on any other page (About, Contact, etc.).
Updating the founder photo or its positioning.
